attachments.title: THE FUNKSHUN VOL. 3 | MIXED BY K-$ADILLA & CURATED BY BLR & K-$ADILLA (8/17/17 | FUTURE FUNK MUSIC) by THUNDERSTONE RADIO
attachments.text:
Get hip, get funky, get wild folks, it's the Funkshun Vol.3! This tape is full of all the future funk, disco, vaporwave, essentially all the funky ass bangers you need to shake that ass, like it's 1975 and we at a cocaine filled club in Miami with jheri curl juice washing the floor--I digress. But, fuck it, just make sure that chest meat is out and your Soul Glow ready, god dammit, because you're about to ride that Funkshun for a funky lit ass time on Thunderstone Radio. 

Tracklist:
1. Johnny Bravo (prod. psymun & sen 09) - Dizzy Fae
2. This Way - Silo
3. When There's No Love - Ourra & Andre Espeut
4. Burn - Ma Board Olympic & Childhood
5. Disco Panettone - Pablo J & The Lobsterettes
6. Anything - Costanza
7. MC Lan curtindo os Anos 80 - PMM
8. Need You - Kattch & Friends ft. Classic Files
9. Yo Bene - Lewis OfMan
10. In My Life - Childhood
11. Half Way - SUPERSEX420
12. My Love is You - P r e l u d e 8 8
13. Love Competition - Kamron Schrader
14. My Heart is Yours - BAYWATCH
15. Saturday - SERIIE
16. あなたの愛/Your Love - 学校のとやま / Skule-Toyama
17. BBYLUV - Childhood
18. Nights Over Tokyo - Jelly BonBon
19. Extra - Kaiju Club
20. Say To Me - Le Phunk
21. Gimme Gimme - Otoyo
